verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I survey the wondrous cross
On which the Prince of glory died
My richest gain I count but loss
And pour contempt on all my pride

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
See from His head, His hands, His feet
Sorrow and love flow mingled down
Did e'er such love and sorrow meet
Or thorns compose so rich a crown?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Were the whole realm of nature mine
That were an offering far too small
Love so amazing, so divine
Demands my soul, my life, my all, hey

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Singing, thank You for the cross
I thank You for the cross
I thank You for the cross, my Lord

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I love You for the cross
I love You for the cross
I love You for the cross, my Lord

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Thank You for the cross

verse.name: v7

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Thank You for the cross, oh, yeah, oh, yeah
